attributes.action: Make all politicians undergo a series of tests
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All politicians should undergo several tests.
You wouldn’t employ someone without asking a series of questions. 


All politicians should be tested on the following

General knowledge

Local and national issues

Front benchers should have additional tests on

International issues 

Management 

Impartiality 

Problem solving 

The results should be made public.


I want to know when I pay someone ₤60K a year I am getting value for money.
